text: Far West Story is a 1952 Australian short film which had a cinematic release. It was made to promote the Far West Children's Health Scheme. It starred Muriel Steinbeck and Grant Taylor and was produced by T.O. McCreadie. ==Plot== A young girl living on an outback station comes down with polio. ==Cast== * Alan Clarke * Laurie Mathers * Grant Taylor * Muriel Steinbeck ==References== ==External links== * Far West Story at National Film and Sound Archive Category:Australian short films Category:Australian films
title: Far West Story
